properties.displayName: Enable audit category group resource logging for supported resources to storage
properties.description: Resource logs should be enabled to track activities and events that take place on your resources and give you visibility and insights into any changes that occur. This initiative deploys diagnostic setting using the audit category group to route logs to storage for all supported resources.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
Resource Location must be in the same location as the Storage Account.
Full path (resourceId) to the storage account.
List of Resource Types to be evaluated for diagnostic setting existence.
